creator: MosaLingua Crea
descriptionHtml:
Learn about our highly effective method to learn business Spanish, geared towards people who want to learn Spanish within a professional context.

You will be shocked with the results and speed of your progress. Our Business Spanish course was made with those of us in mind who have particularly full schedules.


Hundreds of thousands of people from all over the world use MosaLingua every day, and their reviews are the best proof of our effectiveness: an average score of 4.5/5 from more than 6,000 reviews of our applications!


Our application for learning business Spanish was designed for professional needs. The app hones in on the key vocabulary and skills required for the professional world, including:

► Being able to speak on the telephone

► Being able to write emails in Spanish

► Feeling at ease making connections with customers, clients, colleagues and superiors who speak Spanish

► Knowing how to lead a meeting

► Being able to pass a job interview in Spanish

► Learning how to negotiate in Spanish!


Do you work in sales, marketing, advertising or customer service? 

Are you a professional in human resources, finances or accounting?

Are you a specialist in information technology, production or sales?

Then MosaLingua Spanish is for you!


Using targeted vocabulary, you can focus on the most useful content according to your specialty or profession.

In addition, this application gives you numerous tips straight from experts of the international workplace in order to improve your professional business exchanges, as well as linguistic hacks on how to learn Spanish quickly and efficiently.

Give it a free test run today. We’re certain MosaLingua Business Spanish will respond to you needs.
descriptionShort: Speak and learn business Spanish quickly with MosaLingua

appDetails.developerAddress: 2301, 23F Bayfield Building, 99 Hennessy Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here’s what we’ve been working on:
Adding lessons about French pronunciation (French app)
Lots of minor content improvements (new recordings in French)
Squashing more than 10 nasty little bugs!
Improving some screens

If you like this update, consider rating our app. For suggestions, or to notify us about bugs you find, email us at support_en@mosalingua.com. Thanks, and happy learning!

appDetails.developerAddress: 97 cours Gambetta, 69003 Lyon (France)

Adding the possibility to display a Google image search on flashcards (to help you understand the different meanings of a word with visuals)
Improving hands-free mode: better thinking time settings
Adding new, useful flashcards
Squashing many nasty little bugs!

If you like this update, consider rating our app. For suggestions, or to notify us about bugs you find, email us at support_en@mosalingua.com. Thanks, and happy learning!

Do you work in sales, marketing, advertising or customer service? 

Are you a professional in human resources, finances or accounting?

Are you a specialist in information technology, production or sales?

Then MosaLingua Spanish is for you!


Using targeted vocabulary, you can focus on the most useful content according to your specialty or profession.

In addition, this application gives you numerous tips straight from experts of the international workplace in order to improve your professional business exchanges, as well as linguistic hacks on how to learn Spanish quickly and efficiently.

Give it a free test run today. We’re certain MosaLingua Business Spanish will respond to you needs.

Are you a professional in human resources, finances or accounting?

Are you a specialist in information technology, production or sales?

Then MosaLingua Spanish is for you!


Using targeted vocabulary, you can focus on the most useful content according to your specialty or profession.

In addition, this application gives you numerous tips straight from experts of the international workplace in order to improve your professional business exchanges, as well as linguistic hacks on how to learn Spanish quickly and efficiently.

Give it a free test run today. We’re certain MosaLingua Business Spanish will respond to you needs.

title: Learn Business Spanish Fast

container.value:
DigiSchool Group,
LE BLOK, 30 rue Joannès Carret
69009 LYON, FRANCE

creator: MosaLingua (digiSchool)
descriptionHtml:
Learn about our highly effective method to learn business Spanish, geared towards people who want to learn Spanish within a professional context.

You will be shocked with the results and speed of your progress. Our Business Spanish course was made with those of us in mind who have particularly full schedules.


Hundreds of thousands of people from all over the world use MosaLingua every day, and their reviews are the best proof of our effectiveness: an average score of 4.5/5 from more than 6,000 reviews of our applications!


Our application for learning business Spanish was designed for professional needs. The app hones in on the key vocabulary and skills required for the professional world, including:

► Being able to speak on the telephone

► Being able to write emails in Spanish

► Feeling at ease making connections with customers, clients, colleagues and superiors who speak Spanish

► Knowing how to lead a meeting

► Being able to pass a job interview in Spanish

► Learning how to negotiate in Spanish!


Do you work in sales, marketing, advertising or customer service? 

Are you a professional in human resources, finances or accounting?

Are you a specialist in information technology, production or sales?

Then MosaLingua Spanish is for you!


Using targeted vocabulary, you can focus on the most useful content according to your specialty or profession.

In addition, this application gives you numerous tips straight from experts of the international workplace in order to improve your professional business exchanges, as well as linguistic hacks on how to learn Spanish quickly and efficiently.

Give it a free test run today. We’re certain MosaLingua Business Spanish will respond to you needs.
